column2: [[1943]]) is an American actress. She originally shot to fame in [[1955]] as a [[wikipedia:Mouseketeer|Mouseketeer]]
column3: and remained one until adulthood. In [[1978]]
column4: she participated in [[Ralph Bakshi]]'s [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|film of ''The Lord of the Rings'']]
column5: as the rotoscoping actor of [[Frodo Baggins]].
